meanings.definition: A small, dense cluster or mass of fungal spores.
meanings.sent1: The acervulus of spores on the leaf looked like a tiny mushroom village.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the acervulus under the microscope to study the fungal spores.
meanings.sent3: The acervulus of spores seemed to be having a party on the plant leaf.
meanings.sent4: The acervulus of spores was a hidden treasure chest of microscopic wonders.
meanings.sent5: The acervulus of spores was like a bustling city of tiny inhabitants.

meanings.definition: A small, dense cluster or mass of plant cells.
meanings.sent1: The acervulus of plant cells formed a protective barrier around the stem.
meanings.sent2: The gardener noticed an acervulus of cells growing at the base of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The acervulus of plant cells looked like a miniature fortress guarding the plant.
meanings.sent4: The acervulus of cells was a tiny powerhouse of growth and vitality.
meanings.sent5: The acervulus of plant cells was a vibrant mosaic of green life.
